objects.text: • 2 Cute Cats • Spinning Palm Tree • Relaxing Hammock

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This playful and vibrant banner showcases a central product image of a colorful cat playground featuring cute toy cats, palm trees, and playful accessories. The background uses a dual-tone leafy green wave design with whimsical dotted and curved line accents, giving it a fun, engaging style. At the top, a bold headline (`heading`) draws attention, followed by a smaller subheading (`subheading`) that adds branding context. To the right of the product, the price (`price`) is prominently displayed in a bordered white circle. At the bottom, a feature highlight (`description`) lists product benefits, and a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta`) encourages immediate shopping. 

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green: #28572a
- Emerald Green: #027223
- Light Mint: #bde9c9
- Soft White: #ffffff
- Accent Pink (from product): #ef4aa8
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette perfect for a child's toy advertisement banner. The colors are bright and cheerful, blending complementary hues harmoniously while highlighting key features. Dominant colors include a bold pink (#F25CA2) for the treehouse, mint green (#48C2A8) used for the grass base and palm leaves, and a soft peach (#F6C89F) for the trunk and sand. Accents in lavender purple (#BC9CF1), sky blue (#4BC5EC), and bright red (#EC1C4B) bring visual interest, especially for accessories. The animals are in neutral tones, allowing the vivid surroundings to pop while maintaining an overall cohesive and exciting aesthetic.
